description: Shows ASP.NET (Core/5/6/7) metrics from OpenTelemetry NuGet

panels.title: Requests Count by Method and Route
Requests Duration by Method and Route

targets.expr: sum(increase(multitenantapp_http_server_request_duration_seconds_sum{exported_job=~"$exported_job",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance", http_route=~"$http_route"}[$__rate_interval])) by (http_request_method,http_route) / (sum(increase(multitenantapp_http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{exported_job=~"$exported_job",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance", http_route=~"$http_route"}[$__rate_interval])) by (http_request_method,http_route) + 0.1)

panels.title: Average Request Duration by Method and Route
Error Count by Method and Route

targets.expr: sum(rate(multitenantapp_http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{exported_job=~"$exported_job",http_route!="",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance", http_response_status_code=~"2..", http_route=~"$http_route"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d) or vector(0)) / sum(rate(multitenantapp_http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{exported_job=~"$exported_job",http_route!="",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance", http_route=~"$http_route"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d))

sum(rate(multitenantapp_http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{exported_job=~"$exported_job",http_route!="",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance", http_response_status_code=~"4..", http_route=~"$http_route"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d) or vector(0)) / sum(rate(multitenantapp_http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{exported_job=~"$exported_job",http_route!="",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance", http_route=~"$http_route"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d))

panels.title: Requests Count by Method and Server Address
Requests Duration by Method and Route
Average Request Duration by Method and Server Address

targets.expr: sum(rate(multitenantapp_http_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{exported_job=~"$exported_job", server_address!="192.168.239.18",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance", http_response_status_code=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d) or vector(0)) / sum(rate(multitenantapp_http_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{exported_job=~"$exported_job", server_address!="192.168.239.18",  exported_instance=~"$exported_instance"}[$__rate_interval] offset 1d))

title: General Metrics - .NET
